item.description:
Hi fellow photographers:
Wondering how many of you is interested in learning the inns and outs of the software from Photographers point of view. I usually prefer to offer my teaching in Beginners/ intermediate advanced levels. I also can cover the best of Plug-ins out there.
Course will run normally 2 - 3 hours at a time. I will assume you have no prior knowledge of software but you have it ready on your (Trial version is OK) laptop.
Of course there will be a charge, the more people sign up the less it will be.
Classes will be windows / mac compatible.
This could be a cross photography groups in cetral CT on meetup.
item.name: Photoshop/ Camera raw/ Lightroom BOOT CAMP
